replies.body: I thought legendary skins were never on sale, but if that's not the case I might buy the god fist lee sin.
it's not really a sale, its just them doing their "new" thing where instead of release skin sales they do the sales 6 (or 3? i dont remember) months later.
Not really sure who downvoted you, but you're exactly right. They go on Early Sales now, but never in the monthly sales.

"'new' thing"?
Early Sales have been happening for ~2 years now.
I think they meant it in relative terms. Considering how long sales have existed it is a "new" thing.
6 months
That Cosmic Reaver Kassadin though {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
that Jinx sticker makes me lov that I have that skin more. I was going to go another way with that, but I dont want a Ban Hammer on me. ANYWAYS. Cosmic Reaver only feels good at full price ;)
Riot pls, almost 800 days of no sale for project leona {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Imagine, if you'd put away a quarter every week since the last sale you be able to buy that skin twice by now.

Really makes you think.
Actually Project Leona was early this year, February early sales.

No, here is february sales for this year and the only leona sale was the champion sale, no skin sale 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-sales-schedule-0
The one you are talking about is the 2016 february sale
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-sales-schedule
Which was 2 years, 8 months ago. And it wasnt even the 50% sale.
you know its only 2017 right now... right ? - 20 months since Feb 2016 which is a year 8 months. NOT 2 yeasr 8 months{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Patience is a virtue. Thank you for putting both the skins on sale that I have been wanting for months.
I feel you. I've been waiting for Spirit Fire Brand to go on sale ever since it's release. It is finally our time :')
I was waiting for it myself but then Hextech Gods smiled upon me and I got the shard.
That's a feel good moment right there, congrats!
How can Forsaken Olaf go on sale in November when he's being thrown into the legacy vault on November 1st?
Wait, where did they announce what skins were going in the vault soon? :o
Found it! I hunted it down. If anyone else hasn't seen it http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/rather-spooky-vaulting-skins

I don't see him on the list.
Did they do an edit? or did you mis-read?
It looks like the list was edited. I don't think Frosted Ezreal was on the original, so they may have replaced Forsaken Olaf with him.
Riot I want blackfrost anivia PLEASEEEE!
No skin sales for legendary ones after the early sales :(
Can I buy these skins in a bundle.. There's like 10 skins I want. Take my money
O yeah gimme that Tango eve
What about Shadow Evelyn? That skin is actually good now,since its no longer a recolor. I'm going to save up for it, idk about you.
No Slayer Jinx in November!? {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Pretty sure Slayer Jinx is a Legacy>Harrowing skin. It doesn't go on normal sales, but there might be a special Halloween Bundle or something.
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/events/tales-from-the-rift-2017

Well, my wallet will appreciate November, there's nothing I want in that list
...well maybe Camille
A bug in our algorithm...
Ty for the awesome sales. Looking forward to picking up alot of these skins!
How long does the early sales last for?
So when is the early sales?
I've been waiting two years for Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao to go on sale. Did I miss it?
Actually they never did a discount for legendary releases before of this system, wtf is going on, legendaries are supposed to never go on sale ever

They have been going on a one time sale about 6 months after their release since about the start of 2016. 

Ultimate skins also go on sale.
If you didn't know it's on sale now..
6 months from when they first come out

Wait, but that means that if it came out on May 9, then it should go on sale on November 9...


Does that mean they're gonna have it on sale on December 9, or are there certain dates that have the early sales (as in are they EXACTLY six months after, or are do they go on sale the first week of the month, or...?)
I was hoping for Arcade Ahri to be on sale. It’s been over an year :/
She was in an early sale back during the very end of January. Prob won't be another couple of months until she hits rotation again.

Dang, Death Blossom Kha'Zix was just on sale...

I wonder how they choose these.
Thanks for saving my money again.

Error404

Nice sales.
Dark Star Orianna for 900? What a steal! {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Some okay skins but overall not a month of sales I need to worry about.
